question_text: Why might a Bluetooth stylus not function properly on a tablet, even if both devices support Bluetooth?
answer_options: Styluses require internet access to sync
Styluses only work with magnetic screens
The stylus and tablet may be incompatible at the protocol level
correct_answer: The stylus and tablet may be incompatible at the protocol level
explanation: Stylus functionality relies on device-specific drivers and firmware, not just Bluetooth pairing â€” compatibility is critical.
